author: Unity
description:
Missed the awards? Check out the rest of the winners here: https://on.unity.com/UnityAwardsWrapUp

#MadeWithUnity #Unity #UnityAwards #HollowKnight #Silksong #IndieGames
title: Congrats to our Best Console / Desktop game winner at the Unity Awards, Hollow Knight: Silksong! 🏆🪡

author: Unity
description:
Valheim’s memory scalability was limited by the default asset management in Unity. To reduce the game’s memory usage, we implemented asset streaming. In this talk, I will share our insights from that project and dive deep into Unity’s asset management, Asset Bundles, and Addressables. I will also cover how we developed our own abstraction layer on top of Asset Bundles, instead of using Addressables, to better meet our needs.

#Unity #Unite2025 #Valheim
title: Asset streaming in Valheim | Unite 2025

author: Unity
description:
Step into the cockpit of nostalgia with "CLEARED HOT", a thrilling helicopter shooter that blends satisfying physics with light tactical elements. Engage in intense aerial combat as you shoot, dodge, and maneuver your squad across dynamic battlefields. Utilize your rope and magnet to interact with the environment, picking up almost anything to turn the tide of battle. With overwhelmingly positive reviews from players and a high SteamDB rating, "CLEARED HOT" promises an exhilarating experience for fans of the genre.

Developed by: Not Knowing Corporation
Published by: MicroProse Software

Learn more: https://on.unity.com/CLEARED_HOT
Discover more Unity-powered games: https://on.unity.com/madewith


#MadeWithUnity #UnityGames #Unity #CLEAREDHOT #HelicopterShooter
title: Cleared Hot Launches
